name: POLYSPACE
description:
Jump from platform to platform  and collect all the orbs as fast as you can!

Features: 

  • Fast gameplay
  • Eyecandy visuals
  • Global leaderboard
  • Discord Rich Presence integration

Game made in 2 and a half days for a weekend BUAS Game Jam. All assets are made by myself. The only plugins used are the Discord RPC SDK and ParticleText. Music by NoCopyrightSounds.

byradu.com
